mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_id, name, price, description, keyword, image, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id) values (menu_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{keyword}, #{image}, #{hot}, #{ice}, #{categoryId}, #{cafeId})
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, keyword=#{keyword}, image=#{image} where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set good=good+1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set good=good-1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set click=click+1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set (sweet, bitter, sour)=(select nvl(avg(sweet), 0), nvl(avg(bitter), 0), nvl(avg(sour), 0) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set grade=(select nvl(avg(grade), 0) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select sweet, bitter, sour from menu where menu_id=#{menuId}

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select a.*, rownum rn from ( select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m join cafe c on m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id where m.menu_id!=#{menuId}) where
keyword like '%'||#{item}||'%'
order by grade desc ) a ) b where 20 >= rn

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select a.*, rownum rn from ( select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id order by (case when category_id = 3000 then
abs(#{item}-sour)
abs(#{item}-${key})
else
abs(#{item}-${key})
end) ) a ) b where 20 >= rn
select count(*) from menu
select count(*) from menu where cafe_id=#{cafeId}
select count(*) from menu where category_id=#{categoryId}
select count(*) from menu where cafe_id=#{cafeId} and category_id=#{categoryId}
select count(*) from menu where replace(name, ' ', '') like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or replace(description, ' ', '') like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or replace(keyword, ' ', '') like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
